website_summaries.verdict: Solid rubber ball for dogs who love tennis balls that bounce — but this one will last.
pros: Because it's rubber, it doesn't get soggy like a tennis ball, nor will it pop or lose bounce after being used a while
It floats, so it's good near water
cons: While this ball seems to last longer than most, some dogs can still chew it apart
You cannot pick the color you'll get

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Can’t Destroy it and it FLOATS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This ball is indestructible. My two Labs chewed through tennis balls in a few minutes. My two Buds have taken the term “Retriever” to a new level. We play fetch multiple times a day and they love it. At the rate we play, I’m going to need TommyJohn Surgery. Brewster and Martha prefer the smaller ball and it floats. If your dog loves to play Fetch then you need to add this ball to the dogs’ toy box.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy2Shoes

customer_reviews.title: It's a LIE
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has to accept responsibility for describing products as made in the USA when they are not. I have sent an email to Ruff Dawg, where even at their website they state their products are made in the US. It's a lie--check the fine print (which unfortunately you won't see until the product has been delivered)- "Designed in the USA", "Manufactured in China".. This the 2nd product (the other was Chuckit) that I have returned because of false advertising. While not conclusive, there is sufficient info at websites to cause concern about products made in China that our dogs may chew on.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Horner

product_meta.title: Ruff Dawg Ball Solid Rubber Dog Toy Small Assorted Neon Colors
product_meta.description: Ruff Dawg has created the BEST BALL EVER for dogs with a Lifetime Guarantee. Ruff Dawg Ball is made of heavy-duty solid rubber and measures 2.5 inches in diameter - similar to the size of a tennis ball. Perfect for small to medium sized dogs up to 60 lbs. For larger dogs or extreme destroyers, choose the Ruff Dawg BALL XL (3.5 inch diameter) instead. The Ball is super high-bouncing and can take serious abuse - while still gentle on teeth and gums, so the play can go on and on! This Ball floats for water play and comes in assorted bright neon colors so it's easy to spot in the grass or pool. After January 2017, RuffDawg began to manufacture the Ruff Dawg Ball exclusively in factories in and around Worcester, Massachusetts with a better quality and designed dog toy in neon colors that will float and last. All Ruff Dawg toys are 100% Made safe in the USA of recyclable, FDA-approved materials, free of phthalates, latex and BPAs. Ruff Dawg is a family owned company that has been keeping dogs fit and active with premium quality Made-in-the USA toys since 1998. If you have received one of our previously China manufactured products, please contact us at sales@ruffdawg.com for a replacement.
feature_bullets: 2. 5 inch diameter ball for small to medium size dogs up to 40 lbs.
Solid rubber retrieving toy for dogs is gentle on teeth and gums.
100% Made in the USA of FDA-approved recyclable materials, free of phthalates, latex, and BPAs.
Super-bouncing, floats in water for fetching in the pool, lake or at the beach, assorted bright neon colors for high visibility.
Indestructible with a lifetime replacement from Ruff Dawg.
